# LARGE INDICATORS MODE (EVF)

Select **ON** to display large indicators in the electronic viewfinder. The indicators displayed can be selected using **SCREEN SET-UP > LARGE INDICATORS DISP. SETTING**.

!Large Indicators Mode EVF

- **OFF** | **ON**

> âš ï¸ Some icons are not displayed when **ON** is selected for LARGE INDICATORS MODE (EVF) (ðŸ“– 11).

> ðŸ’¡ If LARGE INDICATORS MODE is assigned to a function button, the button can be used to toggle LARGE INDICATORS MODE on (**ON**) and off (**OFF**) (ðŸ“– 253).

# LARGE INDICATORS MODE (LCD)

Select **ON** to display large indicators in the LCD monitor. The indicators displayed can be selected using **SCREEN SET-UP > LARGE INDICATORS DISP. SETTING**.

!Large Indicators Mode LCD

- **OFF** | **ON**

> âš ï¸ Some icons are not displayed when **ON** is selected for LARGE INDICATORS MODE (LCD) (ðŸ“– 13).

> ðŸ’¡ If LARGE INDICATORS MODE is assigned to a function button, the button can be used to toggle LARGE INDICATORS MODE on (**ON**) and off (**OFF**) (ðŸ“– 253).
